BackgroundObject - Class in game2D.objects
Background objects are immovable objects of the game.
BackgroundObject(Point, BufferedImage) - Constructor for class game2D.objects.BackgroundObject
Constructs a background object with health set to Ingeter.MAX_VALUE
backgrounds - Static variable in class game2D.GameWorld
 
BackgroundTile - Class in game2D.objects
BackgroundTile are not added to BackgroundObject arraylist in GameWorld.
BackgroundTile(int, int, BufferedImage) - Constructor for class game2D.objects.BackgroundTile
Construct background tiles within the specified window size by filling the window with the tiles.
BigExplosion - Class in game2D.objects
BigExplosion plays when player dies
BigExplosion(Point) - Constructor for class game2D.objects.BigExplosion
Construct a big explosion at the location.

BorderWall - Class in rainbowReef
BorderWall appears on the top, left and right borders of the Rainbow Reef game window.
BorderWall(Point, int, int) - Constructor for class rainbowReef.BorderWall
Constructs a combined border wall starting from specified location and extending for x and y units
bounce(GameObject, Rectangle) - Method in class rainbowReef.PopMotion

BOUNCE_DEG - Variable in class rainbowReef.PopMotion

bulletBackgroundCollision() - Method in class game2D.GameWorld
